thread.section_title: PhysioRoom.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.physioroom.com
thread.title: Miki1

author: Miki1
title: Miki1
text:
All fine. If I had known that the delivery would take a week then I would have bought one of the items elsewhere (I needed the 'icepack' urgently for an injury. Compared to another purchase made elsewhere ON THE SAME DAY, the delivery from PhysioRoom came 4 days later).
The size of the Gel pack is not as advertised (|SIZE: A versatile 25cm x 17cm (10" x 7")) It is actually 22.5cm x 15cm (9" x 6").
Still, prices were very fair but perhaps another delivery firm should be used and PhysioRoom should describe products accurately!!
Thank you.
